page.shortlink: api objects security object get users method
page.description: Gets a list of all the users.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns a crlf delimited string of all the users in the system.

page.discussion: Context.Security.GetUsers() gets a list of all the users. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
